name: The Incredible Pirate Race
description:
The legendary keep of Captain Draughtwood was lost to time, along with the grand treasure within.

Now, new clues have surfaced.  Follow them to rediscover the keep and it's treasure so you can use them to rule the seven seas!

This game is an open-source project created in the Godot Engine for the Godot Wild Jam #19.

https://github.com/Inglo-Games/GodotWildJam19
